locale.description: A variant of the IETF language tag of this locale, e.g. 'en_US' for American English (not 'en-US', i.e. with an underscore _ instead of a minus -).

extensionDescription.message: 自动关闭未使用的标签页
extensionDescription.description: The description of the extension, e.g. on the addon page.

buttonTooltip.description: The tooltip of the dustman button when auto-closing is not paused.

buttonTooltipPaused.description: The tooltip of the dustman button when auto-closing is paused.

buttonBadgePaused.description: The symbol over the dustman button when auto-closing is paused.
